thumb.title: [TAS] N64 ゼルダの伝説 ムジュラの仮面 "バグ無し" by Eumeus14 in 2:26:51.40
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q815ecRKqoE以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6504M TAS originally published on 2025-04-22In the direct sequel to The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time, Link is back to being a lone boy without a fairy. One day, he is attacked by Skull Kid (wearing a strange mask) and his two fairies, Tatl and Tael, and they steal his ocarina. After pursuing Skull Kid, he is transformed into a Deku Scrub. Link continues pursuing Skull Kid all the way to the Clock Town (now with the help of Tatl the fairy, a more 'in yo face' version of Navi). They then discover the Moon will crash into earth in 3 days, so they must use the power of time to stop that from happening.This TAS by Eumeus14 (https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/Eumeus14) aims to beat the game using no glitches. A full list of all the glitches that were banned in this category can be found in the submission notes ( https://tasvideos.org/9546S ). There is also a live commentary of this run which you can watch here. (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dl-5tvcWgQ8 )
thumb.last_res_body: そんな方法が… 草 今音下げたろｗ ←10ルピーを手に入... えっ、これだけ・... ここすき これ取るの苦労し... 部屋に蜂の巣を放... 始まる前に撃つな... うますぎるｗｗ スナイパーすぎる ここ頭文字D 無理やりwww ...
